I'm looking to co-evolve substrate templates for use with HyperNEAT. 

Prob=
ably most obvious is to evolve two CPPNs: a structural one that generates t=
he substrate layout and a connective counterpart to fill in the weights. Ma=
ybe one can even develop a single CPPN that does both. 
But of course, one =
can use any generator technique for the substrate template - it just seems =
so elegant to use the same technique for structure as well as connectivity.=


Now, I remember some discussion on this topic in this list a while ago, b=
ut can't remember or find what came of that.

Has anyone made any inroads i=
nto this research area yet? Any references or pointers?

Cheers,

Evert
